turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. My name John, and I would like to place a coffee order for pickup at the nearby Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi john. sure, i can help with that. which starbucks should i place the order at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What's the order in Starbucks on 4th Street, Colorado Springs?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you got it. and what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I see hear a menu?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sorry, i can't help with that yet. you can view starbucks menu online. though, i may be able to help you find a drink. did you want a coffee, espresso, or tea?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want an espresso.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, did you want a plain espresso, or with milk so it's a latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of milk did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like the I want non-fat milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: (deleted)

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, and did you want that iced or hot?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like it iced.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Make it a medium, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 1 grande iced latte with nonfat milk from starbucks on fourth street in colorado springs. the total will b $3.40. should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've placed the order. it'll be ready for pick up in 10 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i've sent the receipt to you as well via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you very much. No. That's it. Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome, have a lovely day.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
